title: Paths for a Host
text:
SELECT distinct path FROM requests
WHERE host LIKE "%ea.com%"

title: Search Parameter Name
text:
SELECT distinct path FROM requests
WHERE host LIKE "%ea.com%"

title: Search Parameter Name and Method
text:
SELECT url FROM requests
WHERE parameter_names LIKE "%update%"
AND method == "POST"

title: JSON Payloads
text:
SELECT url, method FROM requests
WHERE content_type LIKE "%json%"

title: Authorization Header
text:
SELECT distinct url, method FROM requests
WHERE header_names LIKE "%authorization%"

title: Insecure HTTP Requests
text:
SELECT distinct url FROM requests
WHERE is_https == 0

title: Repeater Requests
text:
SELECT 
  req.request_id,
  req.url,
  req.method,
  res.status_code
FROM requests req
JOIN responses res ON req.request_id = res.request_id
WHERE req.tool_source = 'Repeater'

title: Request bodies
text: SELECT * FROM request_bodies

title: Response bodies
text: SELECT * FROM response_bodies

title: All bodies
text: SELECT * FROM all_bodies

title: All JavaScript Files
text: SELECT * FROM javascript_files

title: Everything
text: select * from everything

title: Azure response headers
text: select * from azure_response_headers

title: Activity within Duration
text:
SELECT r.url
FROM requests r
JOIN responses res
ON r.request_id = res.request_id
WHERE datetime(Date / 1000, 'unixepoch')
BETWEEN '2025-03-01 10:00:00' AND '2025-04-01 20:00:00'

title: Filter by Referer
text:
SELECT req.url, req.referer
FROM requests req
WHERE req.referer == "https://www.microsoft.com/"

title: Filter by User-Agent
text:
WITH extracted_user_agent AS (
  SELECT 
    (SELECT json_extract(value, '$.value') 
     FROM json_each(data, '$.headers') 
     WHERE json_extract(value, '$.name') = 'User-Agent') AS user_agent,
    url
  FROM requests
  WHERE user_agent LIKE "%mozilla%"
)
SELECT 
  user_agent,
  url
FROM extracted_user_agent;

title: Server, x-powered-by
text: SELECT * FROM server_headers

title: X-Forwarded- Headers
text: SELECT * FROM x_forwarded_headers

title: Responses with CSP
text: SELECT * FROM responses_with_csp

title: Access-Control Headers
text: SELECT * FROM responses_with_cors_headers

title: Filter requests by cookie
text:
SELECT DISTINCT
  req.url
FROM requests req
WHERE req.cookie_names LIKE '%cookie_name%';

title: Filter responses by cookie
text:
SELECT DISTINCT 
  req.url,
  json_extract(h.value, '$.value') AS cookie_value
FROM responses res
JOIN requests req ON res.request_id = req.request_id
JOIN json_each(res.data, '$.headers') h
WHERE json_extract(h.value, '$.name') = 'Set-Cookie'
AND json_extract(h.value, '$.value') LIKE '%cookie_name%';
